title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Nov. 6
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Nov. 6
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Chart of the Day" Evolent Health (EVH). Evolent Health Inc.'s shares tumbled for a second day as the service provider's proposed acquisition of a customer's health plans ran into opposition. Investors won't tolerate the planned takeover of Premier Health Plans' Medicare Advantage and commercial assets, according to SunTrust. Analyst Sandy Draper, who recommends buying the stock, wrote in a report that Evolent's earlier deals were viewed "as being value-destructive."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
